text:
{"fixed_xml":"

In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgeliefert:

Roberti Stephani Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annokationibus Honrici Stephani Locupletatus Nova cura retensuit digessit &c. Ant. Birrius fol.

Ingleichen geben sie auch den

T. Lieium e. Integr. Sigonii & Gronovior Norit 3. Voll. 8. fl. 6.

künftige Wochen an die Herren Liebhaber aus, dieser Preis aber währet nur bis Ende Januarii 1740. nach welcher Zeit kein Exemplar unter 7fl. 30. xr. verkauft werden solle.

","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"The original input was a JSON string containing an XML snippet, which needed to be extracted and corrected. The XML itself contained numerous character encoding errors (e.g., \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00baffert, \u221a\u2202, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u00a7hret) which were replaced with their correct German characters (ä, ß, ö, etc.). Several structural issues were addressed: 1. The outer tag was assumed to be the root element for the content. 2. The text segments were wrapped in

(Paragraph) tags for better structure. 3. The editor information following the main title in the first block was explicitly marked as instead of being mixed with the title/author structure. 4. The price tag was standardized to . 5. Ampersands (&) were properly escaped as & in the second entry."}
